heading: Lawyer negotiation
lede: You don’t have to deal directly with the other parent if you choose this option. You hire a lawyer to negotiate arrangements for you.
lede_additional: You can still hire a lawyer to negotiate on your behalf even if the other parent chooses not to use one.
pros: quicker and less stressful than court
